name: Number Wizard (WadesterProductions)
description:
Welcome to Number Wizard: A Guessing game

Defeat the 3 bosses to Make it over the sacred lands by guessing certain number in your head and the Enemies will try to guess it. If they do select your number you will have to honestly press "My fate is Sealed" button.

Thanks for playing: This was made by following the Udemy Course, Learn to code by making games by: Ben Tristem, Sam Pattuzzi

**may be some small bugs but thanks for playing**
